products.name: USB C to HDMI 2.1 Adapter (8K@60Hz,4K@120Hz/60Hz), Tpye C to HDMI Converter Compatible with Thunderbolt 3/4, USB 3.1/4 for iPhone 15 Series, MacBook Pro/Air, Tablets, Laptops, Galaxy S24
products.description: Vivid 3D Effect Video Synchronization: The USB C to HDMI 2.1 adapter supports resolutions up to 8K 60Hz and is backwards compatible with 4K@120Hz/60Hz, 2K@165Hz/144Hz/120Hz to avoid visual fatigue caused by low refresh rates. Expandable/mirrorable to a larger screen for a crystal clear visual experience. Supports Dynamic HDR, DSC, HDCP 2.2&2.3, 3D, 8K UHD, Dolby Atmos and more. (Note: Only supports unidirectional transmission from USB C to HDMI)     Wide Range of Compatibility: Type C to HDMI adapter is compatible with all USB C devices on laptops, tablets and smartphones that support "DP Alt Mode" and Thunderbolt 3/4 ports; compatible with MacBook Pro 2023, MacBook Air 2023, iMac Pro 2021/2023, Mac Mini 2023, supports M1/M2 devices, Surface Pro 7, Surface Laptop 3/4, Chromebook x360, Dell XPSPS S22/S23/S24, etc. (Note: Mac OS does not support 8K due to its own limitations)     USB C to HDMI Ultra HD Adapter: with this adapter, your Type C devices can watch sports events, movies, video games and photos/albums directly on HDMI-equipped monitors/TVs/projectors, never miss the game's highlights and your favorite TV shows again. This means you won't be bothered by unstable WIFI and bad TV signal problems anymore. (Please make sure your device supports video transfer function and use HDMI 2.1 or above connection cable. Hub/Docking connection is not supported.)     Exquisite Craftsmanship, The Best Materials: Every detail of THANDBLE adapter has been carefully designed to perfection. Gold-plated connectors ensure secure, high-speed data transmission without interference. One-piece molding ensures an unbreakable connection, and the aluminium housing dissipates heat efficiently for longer use. The nylon braid maximises the service life of the cable and provides maximum safety for your long-term use.     Important: ① Please note whether your USB C source device port supports video transmission or DP Alt mode (you can usually see the DP logo next to the port) ② It is not bi-directional, and only supports uni-directional USB C source signals to HDMI displays.③ Make sure that your output device and display device support 8K resolution and connect the adapter with an HDMI2.1 cable, otherwise it will affect the display effect. (If you are not sure, please contact us, we are happy to help you!)     24 Months Warranty: THANDBLE is committed to introducing affordable, exquisite design of high quality products, we exclusively provide 24 months warranty, the best customer service and professional technical support, if you have any questions please contact us in time, we will respond quickly within 12 hours to ensure your shopping experience long-term satisfaction.

Expandable/mirrorable to a larger screen for a crystal clear visual experience. Supports Dynamic HDR, DSC, HDCP 2.2&2.3, 3D, 8K UHD, Dolby Atmos and more. products.description: This laptop boasts an Intel Celeron N5095 Processor, a 4-core CPU with a turbo frequency up to 2.9GHz. It outperforms typical processors due to its enhanced speed and reduced latency. This superior combination of high performance and lower power consumption ensures smooth and reliable operation, effectively managing a variety of tasks.     Featuring 8GB DDR4 RAM and a 256GB high-speed SSD, this notebook facilitates seamless multitasking even with numerous programs running concurrently. Its storage capacity accommodates complex applications and multimedia effortlessly. Additionally, the expandable TF card slot supports up to a 256GB TF card, while multiple interfaces guarantee sufficient space for your data storage needs.     The 15.6-inch laptop display offers a rich viewing experience with its 1366*768 full HD resolution and 16:10 aspect ratio. Boasting a 93% screen-to-body ratio and an IPS-level wide-view FHD panel with anti-glare coating, it minimizes unwanted glare and reflections, allowing you to concentrate on your tasks without distractions.     The Chicbuy laptop integrates a cooling system design and a high-density 5000mWh polymer lithium battery, supporting up to 6 hours of battery life. Ideal for day-long business activities or continuous classes, this thin and lightweight laptop, weighing only 4 pounds, offers exceptional portability.     The Chicbuy laptop is equipped with four stereo speakers, ensuring an immersive sound experience. Its connectivity options include Bluetooth 4.0, dual-band Wi-Fi (2.4G/5G), a Type-C port, Micro Mini-HDMI, a 3.5mm headphone jack, 2 USB 3.0 ports, a Micro TF slot, and a fast charger DC port. These features enhance its multifunctional capabilities and connectivity options for various devices and peripherals.

It also enables a larger screen to fit into a smaller chassis, giving you a laptop with a more compact footprint. Built-in front webcam centered above the screen frame, take photos or video calls at any time.     【Long Battery Life】 Take this laptop pc with you anywhere without bringing the power adaptor. Its 6000Mah long battery life gives you the flexibility to work or play anywhere for 5 hours. Equipped with cooling fans to ensure continuous work while minimizing noise, so you won't be distracted while working on spreadsheets or watching movies.     【No Latency Connection】The windows 11 laptop designed with HDMI Type A X 1, USB3.2 X 3, Type_C(Only Data) ×1, 3.5mm Headphone jack X 1, 128GB TF Card Socket X 1, DC Jack X 1. It comes with 802.11ac WiFi for speeds up to three times faster than 802.11n, providing high-speed transmission and download. Bluetooth 5.0 for easy and stable connection of additional devices within range.     【ACEMAGIC Care For You】 This laptop is designed with a metal casing to resist pressure and impact. Thin and light enough to slip easily into a backpack and take it with you wherever you need to go. We offer lifetime technical support and 12 months quality warranty for customers. If you have any questions about laptops, please feel free to contact us.

products.description: 🚀【HIGH PERFORMANCE LAPTOP】Maypug 15.6 inch laptop uses powerful Intel Celeron N5095 processor, frequency up to 2.9GHz, no latency, and powerful and faster than normal processors on the basic frequency. Equipped with the latest pre-installed Windows 11 system which is far more safer and faster than previous Windows systems. The perfect combination of performance, power consumption, and helps your device run smoothly and reliably to handle all your tasks.     🚩【LARGE SORAGE SAPCE COMPUTER】Maypug Laptop is equipped with 16 GB DDR4 and 512GB high-speed SSD which lets you use it without a problem even with multi programs open. Provides huge space for efficient operation of the most complex application and multimedia. An expandable TF card slot supports maximum 512GB TF card expansion and extensive interfaces such as HDMI, 2xUSB 3.0, USB Type-C, etc. Ensures you of an enough space to create and store more of your world.     💻【15.6" BIG SCREEN NEWEST LAPTOP】Maypug 15.6 inch laptops with 1080P high resolution screen provides you with a sharp and clear text and images. The 16:9 ratio expands the vertical space of the screen, showing more content, providing a comfortable visual experience and greater efficiency when browsing web pages or documents.     👜【CONVENIENT AND PORTABLE DESIGN】Maypug laptops are designed with an ultra-thin case ensures of a stylish and innovative look, and excellent portability. 2cm slim body, 1.65KG lightweight. What’s more, this business and home laptop features an advanced 38000mWH rechargeable battery life of up to 8 hours. It is very convenient and portable for business trip or traveling. Suitable for daily work and play, it is the first choice for business, offices or students.     💯【365 DAYS LIMITED WARRANTY】Maypug has strict standard for all stages of production to ensure the quality of our 2023 new laptops. All laptop computers are subjected to 200 hours of machine aging tests before shipment to make sure each frame is working flawlessly. We offer ONE-year limited warranty. Any questions about our Maypug laptops, please contact us for an easy solution or a fast replacement!

products.name: HP Stream 14" HD BrightView Laptop, Intel Celeron N4120 Processor, 8GB RAM, 64GB Storage, Intel HD Graphics, Webcam, 1 Year Office 365, Pink, Windows 11 S, 32GB Hotface USB Card
products.description: 【Upgraded】Seal is opened for upgrade only, 1-Year warranty on Upgraded RAM/SSD from SnowBell, and an original 1-Year Manufacturing warranty on remaining components.【14" Brightview Micro-edge Display】Ready for unparalleled immersion with a micro-bezel screen. 【Lightweight Chassis and Sleek Design】Measuring 12.76 x 8.86 x 0.71 inches and weighing just 3.24 pounds, the HP Stream 14 is designed ultraportable to play a part in your workflow anywhere.     【Intel Celeron N4120 Processor】Seamless multitasking and smooth performance are like a breath. Featured with a 1.1 GHz base frequency, and up to 2.6 GHz burst frequency, this laptop is powerful enough even for your busiest days. 【Integrated Intel UHD Graphics】Acting with an integrated UHD GPU, a journey of stunning visuals, vibrant colors, and immersive movies begins anytime, anywhere.     【8GB RAM】The high-speed RAM ensures faster data processing, seamless multitasking, and improved responsiveness that keeps you in the flow.【64GB eMMC】An embedded multimedia card provides reliable flash-based storage. Provides massive storage space to store your documents, photos, files and more.     【HP 720p HD Camera with Integrated Digital Microphone】To be seen and heard in your perfect condition. Enjoy high quality video calls, virtual meetings and online interactions to keep in touch with your connections.     【Windows 11 S included】With Windows 11, leverage a fresh new feel and tools that make it easier to be efficient, it has what you need for whatever's next. 【Ports】2 x USB 3.0 Type A Ports, 1 x USB 3.0 Type C Ports, 1x Headphone Jack, 1x SD Card Reader, 1x AC Smart Pin.【1-year-free Microsoft 365 Personal】Take your productivity and work mobility to the next level with the Microsoft 365 Office Suite (1-year subscription included). Pink. Bonus 32GB Hotface USB Card.
